content: > this pattern is also available for > free on my blog the downloadable pdf > listed for sale contains the full > pattern in one printable file without > advertisements the pattern is written in us terminology this poncho has a knit-look bodice embellished with a lace hem it runs from sizes s/m to 3 xl it is constructed from a simple rectangle and is a very easy pattern the buttons are only for embellishment and not for closure
